__e: If you're such a coward as to want to dump the whole thing on my shoulders, go right ahead, but I've no intention of losing the bay right now, when it's ours for the asking.
You shouldn't lose a commission because of me.
You're asking me to throw away the only thing I got left that they can't take.
For you, if need be I'm willing to give up everything.
There's probably no one like it, but someone whose worth it, I would have given everything up to be with someone like that,
All the same, maybe I shouldn't speak to her of death and giving everything up.
And all others forsake and hold thee to her, to thy life's end?
And all others forsake and hold thee only to him to thy life's end?
I believe that my God could no more renounce me than I could renounce Him because something of my God is in everyone who breathes.
There was a line in the ceremony, "forsaking all others."
You did right to enjoy them. Never refuse a drink if it's offered. Your mother saw only three things:
But you are afraid to marry her because you are not ready to give up other women.
You were willing to give it up for a couple of bucks back there.
Therefore, you must give it up to your duty.
But if I leave the two blades there, they'll spot them and we won't be able to carry on.
"It's best to renounce the marriage immediately.
I was just worried my coming in here might scare you off the project.
You mean to tell me that women among you are not required to renounce the world?
It would be better to give us.
I wanted to ask you to leave, with the others. Give it up before any more are killed.
That's why I've managed to stay alive while most of my colleagues are dead because I know when to walk away and that time is now.
